name: Cooking Star Fever
description:
Participate in a FREE food cooking game! Cooking Star is one of the most intriguing restaurant food games, featuring fast-paced action as well as strategy and simulation fun.

Take responsibility for the cooking in FAST TAP, COOK, and SERVE. Be a famous master chef, cook the most delicious meals, desserts & beverages, renovate your own restaurant, travel around the other all over the world, explore the food cultures and grow your own food empire!

Restore, decorate and upgrade for your kitchen appliances & interior, get to the bottom of the secrets it holds, enjoy the communication with in-game customers and become the best chef ever.

With beautiful graphics, professional effects, and vivid sound, you will be attracted right away.

What are you waiting for? Build your dream restaurant with Cooking Star now !!!

The game features

* Hundreds of delicious ingredients to cook for meals in food games.
* Restore and decorate your unique restaurant
* Enjoy a novel storyline of Chef's and customers
* Hundreds of unique match levels
* Dozens of in-game Master chefs and Owners of restaurants you can make friends with
* An in-game social network, chef's community, where you can use to keep up on all the latest

How to play

* Satisfy the customers with carefully prepared meals and get the tips to improve your restaurant.
* Upgrade your restaurant and kitchen equipment, appliances.
* Unlock more spices and other attractive ingredients.
* Cooking games teach you how to do business and quality service.
* Experience and move from one restaurant to another, with the same goal of giving diners the most delicious and nutritious meals and the best service.

Various Challenges and Goals
* Make better use of your time by upgrading your restaurant's appliances.
* Manage your time so that you can make delicious meals without burning them!
* Manage the fun culinary restaurant games by upgrading the establishment and ingredients!
* Unlock new habits to enhance your life and time management skills!

Are you interested in this cooking game?
Remember to pay attention to good service, be nice to diners and focus on peak hours.
Let's overcome the challenges and experience this fascinating cooking game.
Cooking Star is available for free download. If you are ready to run your restaurant, let the game begin!!!
